author: jycli
msg: Changed to fix Gump build. For GUMP build xml-xalan2-smoketest, it needs to add xalan-unbundled.jar to the boot classpath. However in the xml-xalan/test/build.xml, it uses xalan.jar. Modify smoketest.gump to use the correct jar file.
The patch is reviewed by Henry Zongaro
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

author: zongaro
msg: Added numbering17 and numbering79 to excludes lists for Xalan-J Interpretive and for XSLTC.  Gold results were recently corrected, and neither processor produces the correct result.

author: june
msg: Gold files for numbering17 and numbering79 needs to be updated due to erratum 24 of XSLT 1.0

author: minchau
msg: This ant build worked fine on its own. However when invoked from
the ant build in java/build.xml via its "smoketest" target some strange things happened to
this property.  The xalan.jar property was OK and resulted in xml-xalan/java/build/xalan.jar.
The serlializer.jar property looked to be the same,
on the classpath rather than xml-xalan/java/build/serializer.jar when
Renaming the property from serializer.jar to ser.jar gets around this hiccup.
